attributes.action: Divest the Duke and Duchess of Sussex of their Royal title.
attributes.additional_details: Because they have traduced all the dignity inherent in a royal title.
attributes.background: Invoke the Titles Deprivation Act 1917 to remove the titles of HRH Duke and Duchess of Sussex from Meghan Markle and Prince Harry

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, including asking for people to be given or have titles removed. In any case, the use of Royal titles are a matter for Her Majesty the Queen and not the Government or Parliament.
